price: 19. Auriez-vous cru que le fait de donner à boire au pèlerin et d’entretenir la Mosquée Sacrée soient comparables au (statut de) celui qui croit en Allah et au Jour Dernier et lutte pour la cause d’Allah ? Ils ne sont point égaux auprès d’Allah, et Allah ne guide point les gens injustes.
arabic: ۞ أَجَعَلۡتُمۡ سِقَايَةَ ٱلۡحَآجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ كَمَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَجَٰهَدَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ لَا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ajaʿaltum siqāyata al-ḥāji waʿimārata al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi kaman āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wajāhada fī sabīli al-lahi lā yastawūna ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
